name: GAU-12 Equalizer
description:
The General Dynamics GAU-12/U Equalizer is a five-barrel 25 mm Gatling-type rotary cannon.

When mounted on the Harrier it is supplied by a bleed air driven pneumatic system, meaning it will not fire unless the engine generates at least 60 PSI of bleed air.

Consider keeping the throttle above ~80% during attack runs.
